actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Recreation

official_title: A bill to authorize an affiliated status with the National Park Service for the Wildlife Prairie Park, in the State of Illinois.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to affiliate the Wildlife Prairie Park, owned by the Forest Park Foundation, near Peoria, Illinois, with the National Park Service. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize an affiliated status with the National Park Service for the Wildlife Prairie Park, in the State of Illinois.
